name: FULL SUBJECTIVITY SUITE MK. II
effect: You gain +2 Evasion. This does not stack with the FULL SUBJECTIVITY SUITE Core Bonus. 1/Round, before the dice are rolled, declare that you treat the roll of the d20 as a 10 before applying accuracy/difficulty and other modifiers.
